Ability.Name: Attack
Ability.Description: Attack with equipped weapon.

Ability.Name: Flee
Ability.Description: Leave the battlefield.

Ability.Name: Claws
Ability.Description: Strike a target and deal physical damage.

Ability.Name: Drain Slash
Ability.Description: Strike a target and deal physical damage. 40% of damage dealt is restored as HP.

Ability.Name: Weak Point
Ability.Description: Strike a target and deal physical damage. The target then takes additional damage until the beginning of the next turn.

Ability.Name: Knight's Vow
Ability.Description: Chose another target. When this target is dealt damage, redirects 40% of the pre-mitigation damage to you. Lasts 3 turns or until you or the ally dies.

Ability.Name: Magical Impact
Ability.Description: Strike a target and deal magic damage. Damage is based off caster's Strength and Magic, as well as target's Magic.

Ability.Name: Abode of Souls
Ability.Description: Depletes a target from some EP and imbues your weapon based on the Essence Affinity of the target. Currently stored (max 3):

Ability.Name: Trance
Ability.Description: Chose an ally. Their next ability deals extra damage based on resources spent.

Ability.Name: Crystal Guard
Ability.Description: Reduces incoming damage by 50% for 3 turns. Blocking enough damage under this effect creates a healing wave, restoring HP to nearby allies.

Ability.Name: Evasive Dance
Ability.Description: Increases Evasion for 3 turns. Automatically counterattacks if the attacker is in range after a succesful evasion.

Ability.Name: Holy Wrath
Ability.Description: Deals Holy physical damage to an enemy. Nearby enemies take 50% damage. Nearby allies gain Bravery and Faith.

Ability.Name: Sinister Strike
Ability.Description: Deals physical damage to a target. Deals additional damage against targets under negative status ailments.

Ability.Name: First Aid
Ability.Description: Restores 25% of a target's missing HP. Removes Hemorrhage and Bleed.

Ability.Name: Camouflage
Ability.Description: Caster cannot be directly targeted by abilities for 2 turns. Damaging a target removes this effect.

Ability.Name: Bloody Murder
Ability.Description: Strike a target. Deals bonus damage against targets below 20% HP. If the target dies, restores HP based on damage dealt.

Ability.Name: Curative Fog
Ability.Description: Removes Poison, Blind, Silence, Slow, Hemorrhage and Bleed from the party.

Ability.Name: Axe Throw
Ability.Description: Throws an axe at a target, dealing damage and inflicting Bleed III.

Ability.Name: Cleave
Ability.Description: Strikes a target and all other units in a small radius around it, dealing damage and inflicting Break I.

Ability.Name: Crush
Ability.Description: Strikes a target, heavily damaging it. Also inflicts Grounded.

Ability.Name: Bloodbath
Ability.Description: Swing your weapon around, dealing damage. Restores 25% of missing Health for each unit struck.

Ability.Name: Execute
Ability.Description: Strike an enemy, dealing damage based on their missing HP. Finishes off any target below a certain threshold.

Ability.Name: Endless Rampage
Ability.Description: Increases Strength, Critical Strike damage, Critical Strike chance and Agility for 2 turns. Extends for 1 extra turn after killing a unit.

Ability.Name: Howling Moon
Ability.Description: Increases Strength and Critical Strike chance for 3 turns. Decreases the Strength of nearby enemies for 3 turns.

Ability.Name: Claw Storm
Ability.Description: Strike an enemy up to 5 times. If the target dies, jump to the closest enemy within a certain range. Successive attacks against the same target deal 40% damage.

Ability.Name: Crystal Breach
Ability.Description: Strike a target and inflicts Break II and Magic Break II for 3 turns.

Ability.Name: Essence Boost
Ability.Description: Grants a target 50 EP.

Ability.Name: Hand of Protection
Ability.Description: Grants a Protect, Shell and Regen.

Ability.Name: Essence Flux
Ability.Description: Transfers all your EP to the target. Excessive EP is converted to HP healing instead.

Ability.Name: Saving Light
Ability.Description: Grants Lifeguard to a target, making it survive at 1 HP upon taking lethal damage. Can only be used once per battle per target.

Ability.Name: Negate
Ability.Description: Removes all positive status ailments from a target.

Ability.Name: Void Beam
Ability.Description: Fires a beam to a target that passes through all units. Each enemy hit takes damage. After passing through a unit, the beam becomes stronger, dealing 25% more damage.

Ability.Name: Magic Counter
Ability.Description: Enveils a target. Upon taking magic damage, the target counterattacks.

Ability.Name: Jouvence
Ability.Description: Restores a target to full HP and removes all negative status ailments.

Ability.Name: Wisdom
Ability.Description: Grants all allies 50% MP costs reduction for 3 turns.

Ability.Name: Mana Well
Ability.Description: Reduces MP costs to 0 for the next 3 turns.

Ability.Name: Pain Blast
Ability.Description: Deals magic damage to a target. Critical strikes deal 50% more damage.

Ability.Name: Purify
Ability.Description: Removes all negative status ailments from a target. For each ailment removed, grant a random positive status ailment.

Ability.Name: Flare
Ability.Description: Deals heavy damage to a target and nearby enemies. For each enemy killed, refund 20% of this ability's cost.

Ability.Name: Doom
Ability.Description: Selected target will die after a given number of turns. Delay depends on the target.

Ability.Name: Deadly Spin
Ability.Description: Swings your weapon around yourself, damaging all enemies hit.

Ability.Name: Shatter
Ability.Description: Strike a target, dealing damage and inflicting Break III.

Ability.Name: Impair
Ability.Description: Deal damage to a target and inflict Grounded. If the target is already Grounded, deal increased damage instead.

Ability.Name: Swift Strike
Ability.Description: Slashes a target with your hidden blade in the blink of an eye.
